Discover Lale Team & Values Join Us Deustch

We're changing the way
volunteers work together.

Lale is a complete task management system for volunteers communities.

Robust member management
Easily sign up your volunteers into your circle, set leaders and control what volunteers can do.

Efficient task coordination
Sign up for a task, connect with other volunteers on a task and start a discussion.

Complete event management
Group tasks to tackle big challenges in an efficient way and gather the right people.
Reminders
Lale automatically sends smart reminders to volunteers to make sure they're still available for a task.
Feedback & Achievements
Make sure everybody's efforts are well rewarded and recognized in your community.
We're still building Lale
Join the discussion or even the team, to let us know what we should buid next.
  • Lale is free and open source.
